text.0:
A 22-year-old tribal youth was shot dead while he was hunting wild boars along with eight others in the forest under Dumbriguda police station limits in Vizag Agency on 15 October.

https://t.co/An3ngO161c
text.1:
Fact-check- Old Waterlogging video from Mexico wrongly being passed of as @RGIAHyd during #HyderabadFloods

https://t.co/13AXlCNaBO
text.2:
#Watch: TRS MLA from Uppal, Bethi Subhas Reddy, had to face the angry residents of marooned colonies of Ramanthapur in the city. The MLA, along with a few officials, was touring the area when the residents questioned his “negligent attitude”. 
https://t.co/ei4UO0nAOG
text.3:
Chief Minister K. Chandrashekhar Rao, on 15 October, advised farmers in the state to cultivate paddy in 50 lakh acres and other crops in 15 lakh acres for the 2020-2021 summer season.

https://t.co/rH0KC85LOV
text.4:
A 20 YO engineering student was stabbed to death by youth at her house in Vijayawada’s Christurajapuram on 15 October. Minutes after killing Divya Tejaswini, the accused, Nagendra Babu alias Swami, tried to end his own life by stabbing himself with a knife
https://t.co/8I25FJPyZe
text.5:
#TelanganaRains: 50 dead, State suffers Rs 5000 Cr loss. 

20,540 houses in 144 colonies at 72 places were flooded and 35,000 families were affected

A 50 per cent damage to the crops would result in a loss of Rs. 2,000 crore, they said.
https://t.co/bxbSxySssk
text.6: Nehru Zoological Park,  Hyderabad is open to visitors from 16.10.2020  (Friday) (08:30 AM)  onwards.
text.7: #JUSTIN: Chief Minister K Chandrashekhar Rao declared that following  heavy rains and flash floods the State suffered losses to the tune of Rs 5000 Crore. The CM has urged the Centre to release Ra 1350 Crore immediately for the rehabilitation and relief works. #TelanganaRains
text.8: #Hyderabadrains: GHMC carries out demolition of dilapidated structures across twin cities, a day after the incessant rains. https://t.co/jTRfBMch9Y
text.9:
The body of the postman who had been missing for over 48 hours was found in Nagole lake on 15 October. J. Sunder Raj worked at the GSI Bandlguda post office and had left to deliver letters on Tuesday but had gone missing following the heavy rains.

https://t.co/olYSNIdTRD
text.10: #Hyderabadrain: The body of J Sunder Raj working as a postman, who went missing  at LB Nagar, was found in Nagole lake on 15th October. The man was on duty when he reportedly went missing. https://t.co/92N7HMsHx9
text.11:
Police have booked actor-filmmaker Sachin Joshi and his father JM Joshi for manufacturing Gutkha at Shamshabad. @cyberabadpolice
registered a case against them for cheating and other sections of the Trade Mark Act and seized Gutkha worth Rs 1.25 Cr
https://t.co/4kXrNrUuMx
text.12: Following incessant rains on October 14th, part of the Khilashapur ( Raghunathapalli Mdl ) fort collapsed. No casualties were reported.  #TelanganaRains https://t.co/pEaTXyO4k5
text.13:
Telangana reported 1,432 new COVID cases on Wednesday taking the overall tally to 2,17,670 in the state.

Eight new deaths are reported on October 14 taking the total tally to 1,249. The fatality rate in the state is 0.57 per cent 

https://t.co/kKK34hxTlM
text.14:
#HyderabadRains: 
The claim that the viral video showing the crocodile washed into a residential area and being captured is from Hyderabad is FALSE. It happened in Vadodara, Gujarat in August 2019.

https://t.co/Yy9BZvpjLC
text.15:
#HyderabadRains: One of the operations went wrong at Tolichowki, due to imbalance the boat capsized in the flood waters at Virasat Nagar of Tolichowki, Hyderabad.

https://t.co/eNgbjlkA2Q
text.16: #HyderabadRains: Telangana Chief Minister K ChandraShekhar Rao will hold a review meeting on Thursday at Pragathi Bhavan at 3 PM on heavy rains and flood situation.The prevailing situation in the state will be discussed and measures so far taken.
text.17:
More than 30 people have lost their lives due to the incessant rains and flooding across Telangana.

Thousands of people have lost shelters, while hundreds of homes are still inundated.

Tens of vehicles have been washed away in different parts. 
https://t.co/Q1fqe6B9bC
